sentence: And Rep. Liz Cheney, the Republican vice-chair of the House Select Committee probing the January 6 insurrection, will face Trump-backed Harriet Hageman in Wyoming's at-large House seat.
author: Grace Panetta
title: A guide to the most important primary elections of the 2022 midterms, which will test Trump's influence over the GOP
